category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 6 (Term of Office)
contents: Article 6 (Term of office) ① The term of office of committee members shall be two years, but shall not be based on the number of days but shall be based on the regular general meeting of the Sports Association, and the expiration date of the term is the day before the regular general meeting. Revised January 31, 2019. ② The term of office of the by-elected members shall be the remaining period of the term of office of the predecessor.
